thread.title: Armando
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Armando

author: Armando
title: Armando
text: I called SelectQuote: as I was helping my sister in law look for some home owners insurance options. After we were done not only had our representative helped us with my sister in laws options but at the end of the day he ended up helping me get a better insurance option for myself. Funny thing is I was not even looking for options for myself. As it turns out I sure am glad I was able to contacted SelectQuote: . Very pleasantly surprised.
